faqs.question: What are your hours?
faqs.answer: Our new hours are 10 AM to 6 PM, Monday through Friday.

faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions.

faqs.question: What is your refund policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day refund policy. Contact support for more details.

faqs.question: How do I contact support?
faqs.answer: You can contact support by emailing support@yourcompany.com or calling 123-456-7890.

faqs.question: Do you offer discounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer seasonal discounts. Please check our promotions page for the latest offers.
